title: Codepen.io
description: CodePen is a social development environment for front-end designers and developers. Build and deploy a website, show off your work, build test cases to learn and debug, and find inspiration.

title: Glitch.me
description: Create your next web project in your browser with no setup and we'll instantly deploy it.

title: JSFiddle.net
description: JSFiddle is an online IDE which is designed to allow users to edit and run HTML, JavaScript, and CSS code on a single page. Its interface is minimalist and split into four main frames, which correspond to editable HTML, JavaScript and CSS fields and a result field which displays the user's project after it is run.

title: SVGOMG
description: SVGOMG is SVGO's Missing GUI, aiming to expose the majority, if not all the configuration options of SVGO.

title: RealFaviconGenerator
description: With so many platforms and icons, it's hard to know exactly what you should do. What are the dimensions of favicon.ico? How many Touch icons do I need? RealFaviconGenerator did the reseach and testing for you.

title: Adobe Color
description: Color is a web app and creative community where you and other artists can create and share color themes and inspiration. Save themes to your Adobe Creative Cloud Libraries to use in your favorite desktop and mobile apps, like Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and Photoshop Sketch.

title: Coolors
description: The super fast color schemes generator! Create the perfect palette or get inspired by thousands of beautiful color schemes.

title: Google Fonts
description: Google Fonts makes it easy to bring personality and performance to your websites and products. Our robust catalog of open-source fonts and icons, makes it easy to integrate expressive type and icons seamlessly—no matter where you are in the world.

title: Modular Scale
description: First introduced at Build 2010 by Tim Brown, this site was built as a tool to help web designers size their type in a more meaningful way. The site re-launched at AEA Atlanta 2015 through a collaboration between Tim Brown and Scott Kellum.

title: Type-Scale
description: A Visual Type Scale Calculator

title: unDraw
description: Open-source illustrations for any idea you can imagine and create. A constantly updated design project with beautiful SVG images that you can use completely free and without attribution.

title: The Noun Project
description: Noun Project is building a global visual language that unites us — a language that allows quick and easy communication no matter who you are or where you are.

title: Unsplash
description: Over 2 million free high-resolution images brought to you by the world’s most generous community of photographers.

title: Figma
description: Figma connects everyone in the design process so teams can deliver better products, faster.

title: unavatar
description: Get a unified user avatar from multiple providers.

title: {JSON} Placeholder
description: JSONPlaceholder is a free online REST API that you can use whenever you need some fake data. It can be in a README on GitHub, for a demo on CodeSandbox, in code examples on Stack Overflow, ...or simply to test things locally.

title: Diffchecker
description: Diffchecker will compare text to find the difference between two text files. Just paste your files and click Find Difference.

title: Remix Icon
description: Remix Icon is a set of open-source neutral-style system symbols elaborately crafted for designers and developers. All of the icons are free for both personal and commercial use.

title: iconmonstr
description: iconmonstr - free, monstrously big and continuously growing source of simple icons run by one creator

title: Nu HTML Checker
description: This tool is an ongoing experiment in better HTML checking, and its behavior remains subject to change.

title: fontplop
description: FontPlop is an OSX/macOS application which takes ttf and otf files and outputs a webfont bundle: woff2, woff, ttf/otf. It is the simpler, faster, free successor to FontPrep, which is no longer maintained

title: Prettier Playground
description: Prettier is an opinionated code formatter, that supports many languages, integrates with most editors, and has few options. Try it online!

title: Unicons by Iconscout
description: A customizable icon library with 1500+ pixel-perfect icons in it. Including Outline, solid and Monochrome styles.

title: Material Icons (Filled)
description: If designing for an interface that would work with Google’s Material UI or love how Material UI Icons look, this Icon pack has a comprehensive list of Material UI Icons for you.

title: Koloicons
description: Detailed consistent icon pack in SVG format that can be used in a variety of design tools. Fully customizable.

title: Microsoft Fluent System Icons
description: This is a set of the Microsoft Fluent System Icons - used for products across Microsoft. The Fluent System Icons are friendly - including rounded corners, simplified shapes and come in 2 themes: Regular and Filled.

title: Ionicons
description: Premium designed icons for use in web, iOS, Android, and desktop apps. Support for SVG and web font. Completely open source, MIT licensed and built by the Ionic Framework team.

title: Doodle icons by Khushmeen sidhu
description: Hand-drawn icons using an icon grid. 400+ icons with 15 categories.Free for personal & commercial use. No attribution required. Icons available in PNG, SVG & figma format

title: Vuesax modified Kit
description: This lib was made from Vuesax icons (vuesax.com) with modifications for more easy use and faster connections.

title: Teensy Flags
description: A free set of 16px-wide vector flags of the countries of the world. Inspired by the wonderful FamFamFam country icons, this set has been meticulously designed to fit the smallest of pixel contraints.

title: Memoji
description: Here are some cool memojis you can use for your next proejct. This asset pack would be updated from time to time. Cheers to beautiful designs.

title: Free Vivid Emojis Icons Pack
description: Free Vivid Emojis Icons Pack. 8 funny emojis. Full vector. High resolution for export. Skeuomorph style. Ears are included. Made with love.

title: Operator Lookup
description: Enter a JavaScript operator to learn more about it

title: Open Doodles
description: A Free Set of Open-Source Illustrations!

title: humaaans
description: Mix-&-match illustrations of people with a design library

title: Lukasz Adam Free Illustrations
description: SVG illustrations free for commercial and personal use under the CC0 license (MIT license) — No attribution required.

title: Ira Design
description: Build your own amazing illustrations using our awesome gradients and hand drawn sketch components.

title: DrawKit
description: Beautiful, free illustrations. Updated weekly. Hand-drawn vector illustration and icon resources, perfect for your next project.

title: Illlustrations.co
description: Open source illustrations kit. Designed 100 awesome illustrations during 100 days of illustration challenge (Now added more than 120+ illustrations). You can download all illustrations completely free and use these to design awesome - landing pages, mobile app or presentations.

title: Absurd.Design
description: Absurd illustrations that make sense. What about absurd illustrations for your projects? Take every user on an individual journey through their own imagination.

title: Codesandbox
description: Where teams build faster, together. Create, share, and get feedback with collaborative sandboxes for rapid web development.

title: Website Carbon Calculator
description: How is your website impacting the planet?

title: Ecograder
description: How green is your website?

title: Insights
description: Privacy-Focused Analytics Platform For Developers. Track every metric you need without invading your users privacy

title: Fathom
description: Understand your website visitors without spying on them by using Fathom Analytics. You get all the data and knowledge you need to use your website to generate leads and revenue. And you don't have to invade anyone's privacy or break any privacy laws doing it.

title: Plausible
description: Plausible is a lightweight and open-source website analytics tool. No cookies and fully compliant with GDPR, CCPA and PECR. Made and hosted in the EU

title: Playwright
description: Playwright enables reliable end-to-end testing for modern web apps.

title: Jest
description: Jest is a delightful JavaScript Testing Framework with a focus on simplicity. It works with projects using: Babel, TypeScript, Node, React, Angular, Vue and more!

title: Cypress
description: The web has evolved. Finally, testing has too. Fast, easy and reliable testing for anything that runs in a browser.

title: Nightwatch.js
description: Nightwatch.js is an integrated, easy to use End-to-End testing solution for web applications and websites, written in Node.js. It uses the W3C WebDriver API to drive browsers and perform commands and assertions on DOM elements.

title: Selenium
description: Selenium automates browsers. That's it! What you do with that power is entirely up to you.

title: Puppeteer
description: Puppeteer is a Node library which provides a high-level API to control Chrome or Chromium over the DevTools Protocol. Puppeteer runs headless by default, but can be configured to run full (non-headless) Chrome or Chromium.

title: Google Lighthouse
description: Lighthouse is an open-source, automated tool for improving the quality of web pages. You can run it against any web page, public or requiring authentication. It has audits for performance, accessibility, progressive web apps, SEO and more.

title: Carbon
description: Carbon lets you create and share beautiful images of your source code.

title: Squoosh
description: Squoosh is the ultimate image optimizer that allows you to compress and compare images with different codecs in your browser.

title: Bundlephobia
description: Bundlephobia helps you find the performance impact of npm packages. Find the size of any javascript package and its effect on your frontend bundle.

title: Cronitor - Crontab Guru
description: The quick and simple editor for cron schedule expressions by Cronitor. Quickly understand your cron expression

title: Hero Generator
description: I've had to implement the same hero for several years now, so like a good lazy programmer, I figured I'd automate it. This generator is intended to get you going, it doesn't provide every value but the code output should give you a nice jumping off point :)

title: Fig
description: Your terminal, reimagined. Fig adds VSCode-style autocomplete to your existing terminal. Move faster with Fig.

title: Front Matter
description: Front Matter is a CMS that runs within Visual Studio Code. It gives you the power and control of a full-blown CMS while also providing you the flexibility and speed of the static site generator of your choice. Jump right into editing and creating content with Front Matter and be able to preview it straight in VS Code.

title: Hugo
description: Hugo is one of the most popular open-source static site generators. With its amazing speed and flexibility, Hugo makes building websites fun again.

title: 11ty
description: Eleventy, a simpler static site generator.

title: Gatsby
description: Generate it statically. Generate it dynamically. Or, somewhere in between.

title: VuePress
description: Vue-powered Static Site Generator.

title: Regexr
description: RegExr is a HTML/JS based tool for creating, testing, and learning about Regular Expressions.

title: Workbox
description: Workbox is a set of libraries that can power a production-ready service worker for your Progressive Web App.

title: PWACompat
description: PWACompat to bring Web App Manifest to older browsers

title: pwa-asset-generator
description: Automates PWA asset generation and image declaration. Automatically generates icon and splash screen images, favicons and mstile images. Updates manifest.json and index.html files with the generated images according to Web App Manifest specs and Apple Human Interface guidelines.

title: PWABuilder
description: Ship your PWA to the app stores at lightning speed.

title: appmanifest
description: Web App Manifest Generator.

title: AssistivLabs
description: Instantly test how accessible your experience is with the real assistive technologies your disabled users rely on — screen readers, magnifiers, and more — from any computer.

title: Color Contrast Analyser
description: TPGi’s free color contrast checker tool that allows you to easily determine the contrast ratio of two colors simply using an eyedrop tool. The CCA enables you to optimize your content–including text and visual elements–for individuals with vision disabilities like color-blindness and low-vision impairments.

title: Axe
description: Built on the world’s most popular accessibility testing library, axe-core. Deque’s suite of axe tools offers full coverage for your testing and compliance needs.

title: Wave
description: WAVE® is a suite of evaluation tools that helps authors make their web content more accessible to individuals with disabilities. WAVE can identify many accessibility and Web Content Accessibility Guideline (WCAG) errors, but also facilitates human evaluation of web content.

title: checka11y
description: A CSS stylesheet to quickly highlight a11y concerns.

title: A modern CSS reset
description: A reset of sensible defaults

title: Babeljs REPL
description: The Babeljs REPL in the browser. Use next generation JavaScript, today.

title: Toptal HTML Arrows
description: HTML Arrows is a comprehensive reference website for finding HTML symbol codes and entities, ASCII characters and Unicode hexadecimal values to use in your web design.

title: Social Share Preview
description: Check your social media share previews. Make sure your website is ready to be shared on social media to optimize your conversion on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn & Pinterest.

title: chroma-js
description: chroma.js is a small-ish zero-dependency JavaScript library (13.5kB) for all kinds of color conversions and color scales.

title: Firebase
description: Firebase is Google’s mobile platform that helps you quickly develop high-quality apps and grow your business.

title: Supabase
description: The Open SourceFirebase Alternative. Create a backend in less than 2 minutes. Start your project with a Postgres Database, Authentication, instant APIs, Realtime subscriptions and Storage.

title: Hasura
description: Instant GraphQL on all your data.

title: Fauna
description: Fauna is a flexible, developer-friendly, transactional database delivered as a secure and scalable cloud API with native GraphQL.

title: PostgreSQL
description: The World’s Most Advanced Open Source Relational Database.

title: MariaDB
description: MariaDB Server is one of the most popular open source relational databases. It’s made by the original developers of MySQL and guaranteed to stay open source. It is part of most cloud offerings and the default in most Linux distributions.

title: MongoDB
description: MongoDB is a source-available cross-platform document-oriented database program. Classified as a NoSQL database program, MongoDB uses JSON-like documents with optional schemas.

title: SQLite
description: SQLite is a C-language library that implements a small, fast, self-contained, high-reliability, full-featured, SQL database engine.

title: Image Resizer
description: Easily resize images online for free.

title: Node Tap
description: A Test-Anything-Protocol library for JavaScript

title: nvs
description: Node Version Switcher - A cross-platform tool for switching between versions and forks of Node.js

title: SEO Writing Assistant
description: A smart writing editor that helps you optimize your copy for engagement and SEO.

title: Title Generator
description: Generate great titles for articles and blog posts

title: Power Thesaurus
description: Power Thesaurus is a fast, convenient, community driven, comprehensive online thesaurus

title: QuillBot
description: Paraphraser, grammar checker, summarizer, and citation generator

title: Headline Analyzer
description: Write headlines that drive traffic, shares, and search results

title: Hacker Target
description: Simplify the security assessment process with hosted vulnerability scanners. From attack surface discovery to vulnerability identification, actionable network intelligence for IT & security operations.

title: espanso
description: Tired of typing the same sentences over and over? Discover the incredible power of a full-blown text expander.

title: Capacitor
description: Capacitor is an open source native runtime for building Web Native apps. Create cross-platform iOS, Android, and Progressive Web Apps with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

title: htmx
description: htmx allows you to access AJAX, CSS Transitions, WebSockets and Server Sent Events directly in HTML, using attributes, so you can build modern user interfaces with the simplicity and power of hypertext

title: hyperscript
description: hyperscript makes writing event handlers and highly responsive user interfaces easy with a clear, DOM-oriented syntax and by transparently handling asynchronous behavior for you — easier than callbacks, promises, even async/await.

title: Vuejs
description: The progressive JavaScript framework.

title: React
description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces

title: Veed.io
description: Compress video and reduce video file size online for free without losing quality.

title: Replay.io
description: Your time travel debugger. Record and replay web applications with familiar browser dev tools.

title: hue.tools
description: An open source toolbox for colours

title: RegexLearn
description: Learn Regex step by step, from zero to advanced. Learning Regex is easier than you think. You can use this tool to easily learn, practice, test and share Regex.

title: Who can use?
description: A tool that brings attention and understanding to how color contrast can affect different people with visual impairments.

title: Fontesk
description: A curated font library of the best high quality free fonts to download for commercial and personal use.

title: Wakamai Fondue
description: See what your font can do. Especially useful with variable fonts

title: GitUI
description: GitUI provides you with the comfort of a git GUI but right in your terminal

title: Adobe Color Accessibility Tools
description: An expanding tool set to test the color contrast and color blindness safety of your color palette.

title: A11y Color Palette
description: This tool should help you visualize an entire palette of all color combinations with accessibility in mind. The combinations are ordered by color contrast ratio.

title: Bangalore
description: An airy and abstract style, minimal and elegant. Easy to adapt to your branding or projects as it uses only two colors. Licensed under the Creative Commons - CC BY 4.0

title: Plump - Free
description: Free set — A flat style that works great on dark backgrounds. Easy to customize with only two colors per icon, highly legible: they are perfect for interface and graphic design. Customize vector path. Licensed under the Creative Commons - CC BY 4.0

title: Elements
description: Whether you’re looking for a geometric, organic or handcrafted look, use these abstract elements and sketch annotations to grab people's attention and make your message clearer and compelling.

title: Flex - Free
description: A minimalistic set, with elegant and smooth curves. Super easy to adapt to your project with only two colors. Customize vector line width. Licensed under the Creative Commons - CC BY 4.0

description: Lightweight clipboard manager for macOS.

description: Get recommended colors in single click to fix color contrast issues.

description: Smaller images mean faster load times. Squoosh can reduce file size and maintain high quality.

description: Squoosh CLI is an experimental way to run all the codecs you know from the Squoosh web app on your command line using WebAssembly.

description: A low-level toolkit to create floating elements. Tooltips, popovers, dropdowns, and more

description: Visual library to help you find the perfect free or paid fonts for your project.
